visualization.help:
# What is HIV-TRACE Viewer?
This tool provides an **interactive network viewer** for results generated by **HIV-TRACE**. It enables exploration of transmission cluster data directly in the browser, allowing users to examine connections between sequences and associated metadata.
## Key Features
- **Network Visualization**: Displays HIV-TRACE output as interactive graphs of nodes and edges. - **Cluster Analysis**: Identify connected components and cluster sizes. - **Metadata Integration**: Color, filter, and explore nodes using available attributes. - **Interactive Exploration**: Pan, zoom, and highlight specific regions of the network.
Learn more at: [https://github.com/veg/hivtrace](https://github.com/veg/hivtrace)
